suppress false positives
Dependencies brough in by codacy report; not used in production

Dependencies brough in by codacy report; not used in production
We do not use: Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE + Spring Security (any version), see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258
CVE-2018-13661: case-app*_2.11-1.2.0.jar is used in codacy for test coverage reporting, thus unimpacted in production

CVE-2018-13661: we aren't using this for Ethereum, The mintToken function of a smart contract implementation for APP, an Ethereum token, has an integer overflow that allows the owner of the contract to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
CVE-2016-7048: only for Postgres lt 9.6 and we use 9.6 on Azure. Also only impacts the installer.

"Untrusted search path vulnerability in PostgreSQL before 7.3.19, 7.4.x before 7.4.17, 8.0.x before 8.0.13, 8.1.x before 8.1.9, and 8.2.x before 8.2.4 allows remote authenticated users, when permitted to call a SECURITY DEFINER function, to gain the privileges of the function owner, related to "search_path settings.". The versions of PostgreSQL are too old we're on at least 9.6 on Azure.
Temporary suppression while we investigate. See RDM-3324
Temporary suppression to ignore CVE with com.google.guava. See RDM-3372
jackson-databind 2.8.x will not get a fix for this CVE. We need to upgrade to 2.9.x. See https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-modules-java8/issues/90#issuecomment-450544881 and RDM-3796
jackson-databind 2.8.11.3 fixes this CVE. See https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2097#issuecomment-457071680 and RDM-3796

Temporary suppression of an issue related to the current stable slf4j which is brought in by other dependencies. CCD don't explicitly declare dependencies on slf4j. org.slf4j.ext.EventData in the slf4j-ext module in QOS.CH SLF4J before 1.8.0-beta2 allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via crafted data. Investigation notes can be found in RDM-3549. slf4j may need to be updated when a future stable version is released
Temporarily suppress spring framework CVE see RDM-3809. Will be removed with RDM-3796 fixes land.
